title: The Wayfarer's Stone, Tales of Twilight Dreams
description: This beautifully illustrated book combines uniquely captivating photographs and exquisitely written poems that span Giselle V. Steele's artistic output from the years 1980 to 2006. Giselle Steele offers an interesting collection of poetry that is both entertaining and inspiring. Her book is truly a unique offering to lovers of poetry and those who can appreciate the artistically written word.
author: Giselle V. Steele
